definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: It does this by challenging the end user for credentials.
sentences.chinese: 为此，它要求终端用户提供凭据。

sentences.english: End-user requirements may be fuzzy or incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 终端用户的需求可能是模糊或不完整的。

sentences.english: What are the end-user demands and the benefits derived by them through prognostics?
sentences.chinese: 故障预知功能带给终端用户的优点和要求事项是什么？

sentences.english: A list of end users assigned to the project and their project schedules.
sentences.chinese: 指派给项目的终端用户列表及其项目时间表。

sentences.english: Often the hosted service vendor will also do end-user support.
sentences.chinese: 一般的供应商也会提供终端用户支持。

sentences.english: There will be no end-user interaction with this tier.
sentences.chinese: 终端用户不与这个层进行交互。

sentences.english: That is all the control the end user has.
sentences.chinese: 这是终端用户所拥有的全部。

sentences.english: It said neither the cargo nor the end user company is on any international sanctions list.
sentences.chinese: 传真称，货物和终端用户均不在任何国际制裁名单内。

sentences.english: A data warehouse should be end-user-oriented.
sentences.chinese: 数据仓库应该是面向终端用户的。

sentences.english: And yes, it was developed in Singapore, and is free for end-user use.
sentences.chinese: 对了，这是在新加坡开发的，并向终端用户免费。

sentences.english: Analyze the initial models with the end users.
sentences.chinese: 与终端用户一起分析初始模型。

sentences.english: The requirements validation process should confirm or reestablish end-user requirements and expectations.
sentences.chinese: 需求验证过程将确认或重新建立终端用户需求和期望。

sentences.english: These editions can be used only by end-user organizations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这些版本只可用于终端用户组织。

sentences.english: Do remote connections originate from end user devices?
sentences.chinese: 远程连接源自终端用户设备吗？
数据集市的建模是终端用户驱动的。

sentences.english: That mea that the end user must opt-in to the service in order to use it.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着终端用户必须选择要使用的服务。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
